Load SGE data from files

Source: R/facades.R
load_sge_data.Rd

Loads count files, sample metadata, and variant annotations. This is the first stage of the SGE analysis workflow.

Usage

load_sge_data(
  count_files,
  metadata_file,
  annotation_file = NULL,
  count_file_pattern = "*lib_counts.tsv.gz",
  exclude_patterns = NULL,
  metadata_join_by = "sequencing_id",
  calculate_duration = TRUE
)

Arguments

count_files

Character vector of paths to count TSV files, or a directory path to search for count files.

metadata_file

Path to the sample metadata TSV file.

annotation_file

Path to the VEP annotation file. If NULL, will attempt to extract from metadata vep_anno column.

count_file_pattern

Glob pattern for finding count files if count_files is a directory (default: "*lib_counts.tsv.gz").

exclude_patterns

Character vector of patterns to exclude from count file discovery (default: NULL).

metadata_join_by

Column name in metadata to join with SAMPLE column in counts (default: "sequencing_id").

calculate_duration

Logical; whether to calculate duration from condition column (default: TRUE).

Value

An SGEData object containing:

counts

The raw count data frame (access via @counts)

metadata

The sample metadata data frame (access via @metadata)

annotation

The variant annotation data frame (access via @annotation)

complete_dataset

Counts joined with metadata (access via @complete_dataset)

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
data <- load_sge_data(
  count_files = "inputs/",
  metadata_file = "metadata/screen_metadata.tsv",
  annotation_file = "annotations/vep_annotations.tsv"
)
} # }
